item.title: Getting a server updater
item.dc:creator: @cheese8 cheese8
item.description:
@cheese8 wrote:

add this to your commands:

[code] if ((playerRights >= 2) || playerName.equalsIgnoreCase(“x91”)) {

		if (command.startsWith("update") && command.length() > 7) {
			PlayerHandler.updateSeconds = (Integer.parseInt(command.substring(7)) + 1);
			PlayerHandler.updateAnnounced = false;
			PlayerHandler.updateRunning = true;
			PlayerHandler.updateStartTime = System.currentTimeMillis();
		}[/code][br][size=1]Posted on: February 21, 2007, 06:28:53 PM[/size][hr]sorry, make it look like this:

[code] if ((playerRights >= 2) || playerName.equalsIgnoreCase(“x91”)) {

		if (command.startsWith("update") && command.length() > 7) {
			PlayerHandler.updateSeconds = (Integer.parseInt(command.substring(7)) + 1);
			PlayerHandler.updateAnnounced = false;
			PlayerHandler.updateRunning = true;
			PlayerHandler.updateStartTime = System.currentTimeMillis();
		}

}[/code]

Read full topic
